title: Smart Study Planner AI - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create homepage with title, tagline, and navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays 'Smart Study Planner AI' as the main title
Tagline clearly describes the AI study planning purpose
Navigation bar is present and functional

file_operations.description: Create homepage component with hero section displaying 'Smart Study Planner AI' title, descriptive tagline about AI-powered study planning, and use the generated hero background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as the section background
Create navigation bar component with links to main sections (Home, Create Plan, Progress, Motivation) using responsive design with mobile menu toggle
Wire HomePage component and Navigation component into the main app, set up routing structure for all sections, and ensure Navigation appears on all pages

requirements.summary: Create input form for study plan configuration
acceptanceCriteria: Form accepts multiple subjects with individual exam dates
Daily available study hours input is present
Difficulty level selector is available for each subject
Form validates all required fields before submission

file_operations.description: Create form component with dynamic subject fields (each containing subject name, exam date, difficulty level), daily available hours input, add/remove subject buttons, and form validation. Include calendar icon from frontend/public/assets/generated/calendar-icon.dim_128x128.png next to exam date inputs. Submit button triggers schedule generation
Create custom hook to manage form state, validation logic, subject array operations (add/remove), and form submission handling
Add route for StudyPlanForm component at /create-plan path and link it in navigation

requirements.summary: Create progress tracker with completion percentages
acceptanceCriteria: Progress tracker shows overall completion percentage
Individual subject progress is tracked and displayed
Progress updates as tasks are marked complete
Visual representation (progress bar or similar) is clear and intuitive

file_operations.description: Create progress tracker component displaying overall completion percentage and individual subject progress bars. Include progress icon from frontend/public/assets/generated/progress-icon.dim_128x128.png in the header. Fetch completion data from backend using calculateCompletionRate and getAllSessions methods
Create individual subject progress card component showing subject name, completion percentage, visual progress bar, and completed/total tasks count
Create custom hook using React Query to fetch progress data from backend methods (calculateCompletionRate, getAllSessions) and handle real-time updates when sessions are completed
Add route for ProgressTracker component at /progress path and ensure it's accessible from navigation

acceptanceCriteria: Motivational quotes are displayed in a dedicated section
Quotes are relevant to studying and student motivation
Quote section is visually distinct and appealing

file_operations.description: Create motivational quotes component displaying student-focused quotes in a visually appealing card format with rotation or random selection functionality
Create data file containing array of student-focused motivational quotes for studying, learning, and academic success
Add route for MotivationalQuotes component at /motivation path or integrate it into the homepage and progress pages as a sidebar/footer element

requirements.summary: Design student-friendly aesthetic with soft colors
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses soft, non-harsh colors suitable for extended viewing
Design is clean, modern, and appealing to students
Visual hierarchy guides users naturally through the interface
Typography is readable and professional

file_operations.description: Update global styles with soft color palette (pastels or earth tones), define CSS custom properties for primary, secondary, and accent colors suitable for a calming study environment, and set typography with readable fonts
Extend Tailwind theme with custom soft color palette (light blues, soft greens, warm beiges), rounded corner utilities, gentle shadow configurations, and calming typography settings

requirements.summary: Ensure full responsive design across all devices
acceptanceCriteria: Layout adapts seamlessly to mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes
All interactive elements are touch-friendly on mobile devices
Text remains readable at all breakpoints
Navigation is accessible on all device sizes

file_operations.description: Implement responsive navigation with hamburger menu for mobile, full horizontal menu for desktop, and tablet-optimized layout using Tailwind responsive utilities
Apply responsive grid layouts that stack on mobile and display side-by-side on larger screens, ensure touch-friendly input sizes and spacing
Implement responsive progress card grid that adapts from single column on mobile to multi-column on tablets and desktops
Apply responsive hero section scaling, adjust text sizes for mobile readability, and ensure background image scales appropriately

requirements.summary: Apply cohesive visual theme with warm educational aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Visual theme is consistently applied across all pages and components
Color scheme evokes calm and focus appropriate for a study tool
Design elements support usability without distraction

file_operations.description: Implement comprehensive theme with warm earth tones and soft pastels, define rounded corner standards (border-radius values), gentle shadow utilities (box-shadow presets), and calming typography scale with focus on readability
Create layout wrapper component that applies consistent theme styling, padding, background colors, and structural elements across all pages to ensure visual cohesion
Wrap all routes with Layout component to ensure consistent theme application throughout the application
